name: Shades
desc: Four Shades created by the Primordial One.

customize.name: Primordial One
customize.desc: The First Descender, who defeated seven Dragon Sovereigns of the world and created people. The Primordial One may be Phanes.

customize.name: Elemental Dragons
customize.desc: An ancient race, who ruled Teyvat long before human existence. Dragons belong to the Light Realm.

customize.text: , the Primordial One created four shining Shades. Together, they reformed Teyvat and created humans.

customize.name: Ronova
customize.desc: The Ruler of Death, one of the Primordial One's Shades.

customize.text:
The Ruler of Death, under whose leadership the Night Kingdom was created and the rules of Natlan were established. It is believed that she greatly exceeded her authority as a shade, and this angered the Heavenly Principles.
Using the divine throne of Natlan allows one to use the power of Ronova, and the price for this power is death.
Naberius
The Ruler of Life, who was devoured by

customize.name: Rhinedottir
customize.desc: An alchemist, a member of the Hexenzirkel, one of the five Sinners of Khaenri'ah, and Albedo's mother. Rhinedottir created an army of shadowy monsters, who attacked Teyvat 500 years ago. She's also known as Gold and R.

customize.text: . Naberius is not gone, but became the one with the Sinner.

customize.name: Istaroth
customize.desc: Ruler of Time, also known as Tokoyo Ookami ( "the thousand winds of time") and Kairos ("the ruler of the unchanging world"). She is presumably one of the shades of the Primordial One.

customize.text: The Ruler of Time is presumably one of the shades.

customize.name: Before Sun and Moon
customize.desc: A chronicle that ordinary folk have been forbidden to read. The writing is a mix of fables and histories from the beginning of the world to the creation of the Dainichi Mikoshi.
